int tld::getBBFromUser ( IplImage *  img,
CvRect &  rect,
Gui *  gui 
)

Get a bounding box from the user.

Parameters:
img image to display
rect CvRect containing the coordinates of the bounding box
gui initialized gui
Returns:
PROGRAM_EXIT if 'q' or 'Q' pressed, SUCCESS if everything went right
